definition: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)/abbr. for 疾病預防控製中心|疾病预防控制中心[ji2 bing4 yu4 fang2 kong4 zhi4 zhong1 xin1]
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: City of CDC TB Division Chen Xiubing doctor said.
sentences.chinese: 市疾控中心结核病防治科陈秀兵医师说。

sentences.english: The C. D. C. decided to release its results simultaneously.
sentences.chinese: 疾控中心决定同时发布它的结果。

sentences.english: The CDC said nine more children had been reported killed by H1N1 last week.
sentences.chinese: 美国疾控中心称，上周又有九名儿童死于甲流。

sentences.english: China Centers for Disease Control and Prevention already had delivered 10000 plague prevention leaflets to the quake zone.
sentences.chinese: 中国疾控中心已经往震区运了1万份疫情防控宣传单。

sentences.english: Xuanwu District CDC of staff, told reporters.
sentences.chinese: 宣武区疾控中心的工作人员告诉记者。

pinyin: ji2 bing4 kong4 zhi4 zhong1 xin1
ji2 bing4 yu4 fang2 zhong1 xin1
shi2 pin3 yao4 pin3 jian1 du1 ju2

definition: HIV/see also 愛滋病毒|爱滋病毒[ai4 zi1 bing4 du2]

pinyin: Shi2 pin3 Yao4 pin3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 ju2

definition: hand foot and mouth disease, HFMD, caused by a number of intestinal viruses, usually affecting young children
